title: Killing chickens

properties.name: description
properties.value: Chickens can be killed at the farm north-east of Lumbridge. Raw chicken can be sold at the Grand Exchange for 126 coins, and bones can be sold at the Grand Exchange for 69 coins. Chickens also commonly drop 5 or 15 feathers that sell for 3 coins each.

content:
Killing chickens
Requirements
Skills
None
Items

Steel or better weapon for Melee

Bronze ammunition or better for Ranged
Quest

ProfitExperience gained
32,063 1,800 600 450
InputsOutputs (32,063)
150 × Bones (10,350)150 × Raw chicken (18,900)938 × Feather (2,813)
The recommended place to kill chickens.

Chickens can be killed at the farm north-east of Lumbridge. Raw chicken can be sold at the Grand Exchange for 126 coins, and bones can be sold at the Grand Exchange for 69 coins. Chickens also commonly drop 5 or 15 feathers that sell for 3 coins each.

Cooked chicken sometimes sells for more than raw chicken, so players may wish to check the prices and then cook them before selling them. The total per chicken killed is 195 to 240 coins. Also, an unlimited supply of raw chickens may be taken from the crates in the food shop in Port Sarim and banked in Draynor Village (or the bank deposit box on docks by the monks) provided the player has begun the Pirate's Treasure quest and is wearing a white apron.

As chickens have very few Hitpoints, a fast hitting weapon such as a scimitar is recommended over a slower one such as a two-handed sword. Once a full inventory of feathers, 13 raw chicken and 13 bones is obtained, it is recommended to use Home Teleport to Lumbridge Castle, and then run back to the farm, taking approximately 90 seconds. Killing chickens is a decent way for lower levels to make money in free-to-play, but it is not recommended for players with higher Combat or other useful skills.

Due to constantly changing prices on the Grand Exchange, some information in this article may or may not be current.
It is strongly recommended to check the live prices on the Grand Exchange before making large investments in any method.
All prices on this page are cached, meaning it is possible that they appear out of date.
To force a new cache of this page, click this link.
If a money making method is out of date, you can edit it or leave a message on the talk page.

[[Bronze equipment|Bronze]] [[ammunition]] or better for [[Ranged]] |Quest = None |Other = None |Experience1 = Combat |Experience1num = 12 |Experience2 = Hitpoints |Experience2num = 4 |Experience3 = Slayer |Experience3num = 3 |isperkill = y |kph = 150 |Output1 = Bones |Output1num = {{#vardefineecho:kph|1}} |Output2 = Raw chicken |Output2num = {{#var:kph}} |Output3 = Feather |Output3num = {{#expr:((5*(1/2) ) + (15*(1/4) ))}} |Location = [[Lumbridge]], across from the [[Lumbridge cow field]] |Category = Combat/Low |Members = No |Intensity = Low |Details = {{Map|3231,3294|mtype=square|r=6|align=right|caption=The recommended place to kill chickens.}} [[Chicken]]s can be killed at the farm north-east of [[Lumbridge]]. [[Raw chicken]] can be sold at the [[Grand Exchange]] for {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Raw chicken}}}} coins, and [[bones]] can be sold at the [[Grand Exchange]] for {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Bones}}}} coins. Chickens also commonly drop 5 or 15 [[feathers]] that sell for {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Feather}}}} coins each. [[Cooked chicken]] sometimes sells for more than raw chicken, so players may wish to check the prices and then cook them before selling them. The total per chicken killed is {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Raw chicken}}+{{GEP|Bones}}}} to {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Raw chicken}}+{{GEP|Bones}}+{{GEP|Feather|15}}}} coins. Also, an unlimited supply of raw chickens may be taken from the crates in the [[Wydin's Food Store|food shop]] in [[Port Sarim]] and banked in [[Draynor Village]] (or the [[bank deposit box]] on docks by the monks) provided the player has begun the [[Pirate's Treasure]] quest and is wearing a [[white apron]]. As chickens have very few [[Hitpoints]], a fast hitting weapon such as a [[scimitar]] is recommended over a slower one such as a [[two-handed sword]]. Once a full inventory of feathers, 13 raw chicken and 13 bones is obtained, it is recommended to use [[Home Teleport]] to [[Lumbridge Castle]], and then run back to the farm, taking approximately 90 seconds. Killing chickens is a decent way for lower levels to make money in [[free-to-play]], but it is not recommended for players with higher [[Combat]] or other useful [[skills]]. }} {{Money making}} [[Category:MMG/Combat]]
